answers.author: Lawrence Di Re
answers.text:
I researched this topic several years ago.  You may want to check the following: Dubuque, IA; Mason City, IA; Oak park, IL; Bowling Green, KY; Niagara Falls, NY; Northfield, MN; Somerville, MA.  Some states have associations of municipal human rights commissions:  http://www.mahrc.org/html/members.html ; http://www.hrusa.org/league/default.shtm .  Hope this helps.

answers.author: Toni Shope
answers.text:
Hi David.  The City of Hampton has a Unity Commission. They presented before at TLG and won awards. Here is the link to their website: http://www.hampton.gov/unity/

answers.author: Jennifer Kimball
answers.text:
David- The City of Rockville has a Human Rights Commission.  Info at www.rockvillemd.gov/government/commissions/hr.  We're at 61,000 population but I figured that wouldn't be a problem!

author: David Ellis
text:
Hello, I am looking for examples of jurisdictions with a population of 60,000 or less who operate Human Rights Commissions.
Thanks
David
title: Human Rights Commissions
